Tyrael: As I said, it's your project. Dreadplague, please assist him. 
I'll look over our strategic position. I may move the ship so we can 
have a better position in an assault.

Dreadplague: Yes, Father... So, Angel (her voice is suddenly light), 
looks like we're stuck together!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Darkangel : :
> 
> Darkangel: I'm not aware of any stray bots we could pick up here on 
> Earth, so I'd have to contact Cybertron. Have the government send 
> some reinforcements.
>

get
